section.p: The jaw of the skeletal captain drops open and a chilling voice issues forth: ‘Go to Chompo in Akatsurai. There you will find a clue that will lead you to the tomb of the necromancer Dawatsu Morituri, whom you must set free. This is our dread lord’s command.’

They return to their vessel and sail off.
